knimeNode.name: Peak Separation Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reports spectra which contain the specified distance(s) between peaks in the output table. Other input spectra (rows) will be ignored.

fullDescription.intro: Reports spectra which contain the specified distance(s) between peaks in the output table. Other input spectra (rows) will be ignored.
fullDescription.option: Choose the column to perform filtering on

ports.inPort: Input table with spectra column to process
ports.outPort: Input rows which match the chosen filtering method are shown
